creator: Siam Computing
descriptionHtml:
The Story Based Learning App

Read. Listen. View. Perform. Create.

Looking for ways to engage your child? Worried about too many mindless videos? Crea-play engages your child through the world of stories. Be it through activities that will allow them to create stories, read them out loud, improv, playwriting or consuming our own stories in various formats like video books, audio books and read along.

Built by years of research from professional theatre artistes from around the world, we aim to improve the cognitive, social, language and physical attributes of your child by a community driven story based platform. Crea-Play designs it’s content in consultation with expert academicians and seasoned artists, thus, creating a one of a kind art education pedagogy. The content on the app is curated, with strict standards in place to ensure children consume responsible and appropriate content.

The application is built to be an interactive one, serving as a platform for cross-cultural interaction for budding storytellers from around the globe. Features in the application include, online workshops and masterclasses in multi-format story writing[Playwrighting, Creative prose writing, Poetry writing, Screen Writing and Audiobook creation] and stories through performances across numerous art forms, including theatre, dance and music.
Join 1000’s of kids from around the world to participate and be part of the magic.
descriptionShort: The story based learning app for children to read listen view perform and create

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Various minor improvements to make your app experience better.
